member.name: ATTACHMENT_PROMPT
member.summary: Provides a set of flags to be used with to indicate the type of prompt UI to display.

member.name: ATTACHMENT_PROMPT.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT_SAVE
member.summary: Displays a prompt asking whether the user would like to save the attachment.

member.name: ATTACHMENT_PROMPT.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT_EXEC
member.summary: Displays a prompt asking whether the user would like to execute the attachment.

member.name: ATTACHMENT_PROMPT.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT_EXEC_OR_SAVE
member.summary: Displays a prompt giving the user a choice of executing or saving the attachment.
